sourcesContent:
import { DefaultTheme } from "styled-components";

export const lightTheme: DefaultTheme = {
  bgColor: "#e7e7e9",
  textColor: "#222222",
  secondaryTextColor: "#666666",
  accentColor: "royalblue",
  accentFadedColor: "#e2e8f9",
  cardColor: "white",
  boardColor: "#efefef",
  activeCardColor: "#f7f7f7",
  buttonColor: "#ededed",
  hoverButtonColor: "#cfcfcf",
  hoverButtonOverlayColor: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)",
  glassColor: "rgba(188, 188, 188, 0.25)",
  scrollBarColor: "#bababa",
};

export const darkTheme: DefaultTheme = {
  bgColor: "#222222",
  textColor: "#efefef",
  secondaryTextColor: "#adadad",
  accentColor: "royalblue",
  accentFadedColor: "#e2e8f9",
  cardColor: "#3b3b3b",
  boardColor: "#292a2c",
  activeCardColor: "#4d4d4d",
  buttonColor: "#555555",
  hoverButtonColor: "#333333",
  hoverButtonOverlayColor: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)",
  glassColor: "rgba(20, 20, 20, 0.25)",
  scrollBarColor: "#494949",
};
